        "scene10_body,model,root": [
            "She led the King\u2019s roly- poly elephant to the river."
        ], 
        "scene11_body,model,root": [
            "And got the chubby- happy little elephant into a boat."
        ], 
        "scene12_body,model,root": [
            "The boat sank and sank and sank. When it sank no more, Lilavati made a mark on the boat."
        ], 
        "scene13_body,model,root": [
            "Then she got the elephant out of the boat. And the boat was filled up with stones. When the boat sank up to the mark, Lilavati said, \u201cStop!\u201d"
        ], 
        "scene14_body,model,root": [
            "Now weigh the stones. And subtract my weight. \u201cAnd that, O King, is the weight of your elephant!\u201d"
        ], 
        "scene3_body,model,root": [
            ""
        ], 
        "scene4_body,model,root": [
            "So the fruit sellers tried."
        ], 
        "scene5_body,model,root": [
            "The rope makers tried."
        ], 
        "scene6_body,model,root": [
            "The jewellers tried."
        ], 
        "scene7_body,model,root": [
            "The royal ministers tried."
        ], 
        "scene8_body,model,root": [
            "Even the court scientists tried. At last one of them said, \u201cMy little daughter Lilavati can help us.\u201d"
        ], 
        "scene9_body,model,root": [
            "So the King called Lilavati. Lilavati thought. And thought. And thought. At last she had an idea!"
        ], 
        "subject,root": [
